column1: # Sample sheet and experimental design for the Cryptococcus wakeup experiment
#   code: short code summarising sample information.
#         W/C/H - growth temperature category (Warm 30C, Cold 25C, Hot 37C)
#   medium: growth medium of sample, YPD (rich medium), RPMI+ (RPMI cell culture medium + 10% fetal bovine serum)
#   time: growth time from waking up in minutes
#   rep: biological replicate A or B
# Note that sample_ID is *not* relevant to the downstream analysis
